entities.name: boarhound
entities.description: A dog breed mentioned in the text as throwing Ron into the back of the car.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is thrown into the back of the car by a boarhound.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of Ron's friends who is driving the car and asking if Ron is okay.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Harry's dog that is howling loudly in the back seat as they drive through the forest.

relationships.description: The boarhound attacked Ron, throwing him into the back of the car.
Harry is concerned for Ron's well-being and asks if he is okay.
The car passed through the forest, crashing through undergrowth and branches.
